message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate,  $9,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8,500 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $9,800. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,800 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9,000. If you're serious about making a deal, this is my final offer.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9,400. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
